title: Matplotlib GridSpec Tutorial
description: In this tutorial, we will learn how to use `GridSpec` to generate subplots, control the relative sizes of subplots with _width_ratios_ and _height_ratios_, and the spacing around and between subplots using subplot params (_left_, _right_, _bottom_, _top_, _wspace_, and _hspace_).
